summary: Cameron Smith is a seasoned software engineer with a strong background in computer science and data science. He holds a Master's degree in Engineering from State University of North and a Bachelor's degree in Data Science from Tech University of. With over 8 years of experience, Cameron has worked as a Backend Engineer at HyperWeave, Machine Learning Engineer at CloudLoom, and Senior Software Engineer at CodeSpring. His technical skills include proficiency in programming languages such as Python, TypeScript, JavaScript, and Go, as well as experience with web frameworks like FastAPI, Express, and Node.js. Cameron is also skilled in data science tools like scikit-learn, NumPy, and Pandas. His achievements include improving latency by 25% through microservice design, reducing latency by 30% through schema optimization, and migrating legacy monoliths to AWS with zero downtime.
